message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $9,500. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, the product's value to me is significantly higher. How about we settle on $9,000?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I think I can still do better. How about $8,500?
